# Overview & Creative Vision

* High-level audio philosophy
  – What emotions the audio should evoke
  – Desired player experience (calm, intense, whimsical, retro, cinematic)

* Audio pillars (equivalent to design/art pillars)
  – e.g., “Expressive Characters,” “Reactive World,” “Punchy Feedback,” “The Rhythm of Play.”

# Game Summary

* Short description of the game
* Genre, target audience, platforms
* Relevant design constraints for audio (mobile speakers, accessibility, kid-friendly, retro style)
